thread.title: Stocks to Watch: Facebook, Qualcomm, AT&T, Ford, GM, Chipotle, Visa, eBay, Amazon, PayPal, Southwest - MoneyBeat - WSJ

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: Facebook, Qualcomm, AT&T, Ford, GM, Chipotle, Visa, eBay, Amazon, PayPal, Southwest - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Thursday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. —Up 8.3%: The social-media giant recorded rising revenue and profits in the first quarter. Advertisers were undeterred by controversies around the site’s mishandling of user data and struggles to police its platform. —Up 1%: Qualcomm said its Remember When Stocks Were Unstoppable? Next Brexit & Beyond: ECB Seeks Clarity on Economy Before Next Move
